description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區

2025-12-13T07:01:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to heavy traffic at the road section leading from Airport Road to Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb, motorists are advised to use the drop-off area at the Airport’s Car Park 1. Members of the public heading to the Airport are advised to allow sufficient time for their journey and consider taking the Airport Express and buses.
2025-12-13T07:01:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時機場路通往香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區的路段交通繁忙，駕駛人士請考慮改用機場一號停車場落客區。前往機場的市民，請預留足夠交通時間，並考慮乘搭機場快綫或巴士。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Structural / Mechanical Defects or Closure of Access

2025-12-13T09:33:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to mechanical malfunction, the following ferry service will be or have been suspended. 
Fortune Ferry Company Limited
-North Point - Kwun Tong - Kai Tak : suspended from 10:00 am
-Kai Tak - Kwun Tong - North Point : suspended from 10:25 am.
2025-12-13T09:33:00.CONTENT_CN:
因機件故障，以下渡輪服務將會或已經暫停服務。
富裕小輪有限公司
-北角-觀塘-啟德:上午10時00分起暫停
-啟德-觀塘-北角:上午10時25分起暫停。

2025-12-13T10:19:00.CONTENT_EN: The traffic on Sai Kung Man Yee Road leading to High Island Reservoir East Dam is very busy at the moment. The operator of Green Minibus Route No. 9A has strengthened its service to cater for passenger demand. Visitors are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing.
2025-12-13T10:19:00.CONTENT_CN: 通往萬宜水庫東壩的西貢萬宜路交通現時非常繁忙，專線小巴第9A號線的營辦商已加強服務應對乘客需求。請遊人妥善計劃行程，預留充裕交通時間，同時在輪候時保持忍讓。

2025-12-13T15:55:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-12-13T15:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-12-13T19:52:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-13T19:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-12-14T02:11:00.CONTENT_EN: Ting Kau Bridge: Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangement is implemented on Ting Kau Bridge: The speed limit of Ting Kau Bridge is reduced to 50km/h. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-12-14T02:11:00.CONTENT_CN: 汀九橋： 由於強風關係，汀九橋已實施下列臨時交通措施： 汀九橋的車速限制降至每小時50 公里。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-12-14T06:32:00.CONTENT_EN: Ting Kau Bridge: The temporary speed limit arrangement which was implemented before in the Ting Kau Bridge is cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-12-14T06:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 汀九橋： 較早前於汀九橋實施的臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) adds temporary train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時列車服務

2025-12-15T13:00:00.CONTENT_EN: In response to the demand, the High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will add the following temporary train trips: From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Futian Station ● 20, 21, 24, 27 Dec 2025; 1, 3 Jan 2026 : G5834, G5836, G5838, G5840, G5842, G5844, G5846, G5848, G5850, G5852, G5854, G5856, G5868 ● 25 Dec 2025: G5844, G5846, G5848, G5850, G5852, G5854, G5856, G5868 ● 28 Dec 2025: G5834, G5836, G5838, G5840, G5842, G5844, G5846, G5848 ● 31 Dec 2025: G5866 From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station ● 31 Dec 2025: G5690 From Futian Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station ● 20, 21, 24, 27 Dec 2025; 1, 3 Jan 2026 : G5833, G5835, G5837, G5839, G5841, G5843, G5845, G5847, G5849, G5851, G5853, G5855, G5867 ● 25 Dec 2025: G5843, G5845, G5847, G5849, G5851, G5853, G5855, G5867 ● 28 Dec 2025: G5833, G5835, G5837, G5839, G5841, G5843, G5845, G5847 ● 31 Dec 2025: G5865 From Shenzhenbei Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station ● 31 Dec 2025: G5689 Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app; appointed travel agents; or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app, or the High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
